name: Island Generator (Unified)
description:
Welcome to my Island Generation 2D tool, an intuitive program designed to help you create stunning 2D islands with ease. As the developer, Unified, I have taken great care to ensure that this tool is user-friendly and easy to navigate, with a range of customizable options to suit your needs.

With the use of simple sliders, you can easily adjust values and settings to create the perfect island. Additionally, the tool supports smooth scrolling using the popular WASD keys, allowing for easy navigation of your creations.

One of the most exciting features of my tool is the range of noise types available to choose from, each with its own unique properties and effects on your island. With the use of radio buttons, you can easily select the noise type that best suits your needs and preferences.

If you enjoy using my Island Generation 2D tool, feel free to make a donation to support further updates and improvements.

In conclusion, my Island Generation 2D tool is a user-friendly, intuitive program that offers a range of customizable options for creating stunning 2D islands. With its easy-to-use sliders, smooth scrolling, and range of noise types, this tool is sure to impress. So why not give it a try today and see what you can create?
